amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for vocational education basic State grants by $20 million and decreases Goals 2000 funding accordingly.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 43 in the Congressional Record of September 4, 1997, to provide an additional $20 in funds appropriated in the bill for vocational education basic state grants. Funds appropriated for the Goals 2000 program would be cut commensurately to offset the increase.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Peterson (PA) amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
